summary: Provides the core logic for importing bibliographic records into the Open Library catalog. It validates required fields, normalizes identifiers, matches or creates editions and works, imports author data, handles cover images, and integrates Internet Archive items, using MARC and other source formats.
business_intent: Automate the ingestion of book metadata from external sources to expand and maintain the Open Library collection, ensuring accurate linking of works, editions, authors, and digital assets.
